context_bundle.summary: Code signing for Windows (Authenticode), macOS, Linux. Verifies publisher, ensures integrity, builds trust. Windows: EV vs OV certs ($279-$500/yr). 2024 change: EV no instant SmartScreen reputation. RSA 2048-bit min, timestamp required.

onboarding.quick_start: Code signing = digital signature proves publisher + integrity. Windows Authenticode: RSA keys only (not ECC), 2048-bit min. EV cert ($279+) = hardware token, no export. OV cheaper but slower reputation build. Always timestamp sigs.
common_patterns: Sign EXE: signtool sign /f cert.pfx /p pass /t timestamp_url app.exe
EV cert: Hardware token (FIPS 140 Level 2+), no export
SmartScreen: Build reputation via organic downloads, submit to MS

known_errors.solution: Submit to Microsoft for evaluation, accumulate downloads
known_errors.prevention: Expect weeks for reputation, warn users initially
